meanings.definition: A person who excels in sports or athletics.
meanings.sent1: The superjocks on the team always score the most points.
meanings.sent2: The school's superjocks won the championship last year.
meanings.sent3: The superjocks raced each other to see who was the fastest.
meanings.sent4: She was a superjock on the basketball court, dominating every game.
meanings.sent5: The superjocks inspired the younger athletes with their skill and dedication.

meanings.definition: To perform exceptionally well in sports or athletics.
meanings.sent1: He always superjocks during track meets, leaving his competitors behind.
meanings.sent2: The team superjocks every time they play against their rivals.
meanings.sent3: She superjocks her way through the obstacle course with ease.
meanings.sent4: The gymnast superjocks through her routine, impressing the judges.
meanings.sent5: The soccer player superjocks down the field, scoring goal after goal.
